channel.title: How to fix this error when i connect private server
channel.description:
when i try to connect to server (i host one and i want to connect to it) i get :
An exception occured in getCodeBase(): java.net.MalformedURLException: For input string: "43594:80"
please guys how to fix that error ?
thnx

item.title: How to fix this error when i connect private server
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

The source is stable enough for the client.

Read full topic
